job_tasks.phrase: lead the development and implementation of our Tech Copilot chatbot, including prompt engineering, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) optimization, and model fine-tuning.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activities of building and refining AI models, specifically mentioning prompt engineering, RAG, and fine-tuning, which are central to generative AI modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement PEFT techniques such as LoRA and QLoRA to fine-tune models for efficient adaptation while minimizing computational resources and memory usage.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning (PEFT) techniques (LoRA, QLoRA) used for model adaptation, which falls under the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Design, develop, and deploy brand new AI/ML models and algorithms to enhance product functionality, customer support, and overall user experience.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation and deployment of AI/ML models, fitting the core definition of the 'Modeling' task.

job_tasks.phrase: integrate AI solutions into existing products and workflows.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase implies the practical implementation of AI models into larger software systems, which is a key aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Optimize transformer-based architectures and enhance the accuracy of AI-generated responses through RAG systems.
job_tasks.justification: This involves working with AI model architectures (transformers) and improving their performance using RAG, directly relating to 'Modeling'.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and refine evaluation metrics and processes for continuous improvement of AI models and systems, including the implementation of MLOps practices.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions MLOps practices for continuous improvement and evaluation of AI systems, fitting the 'Operations Engineering' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Fine-tune open-source and closed-source models, ensuring they are evaluated for performance and meet real-world application requirements.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of fine-tuning models and evaluating their performance, which is a core 'Modeling' activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the development of AI strategies and roadmaps for future initiatives across various business units.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in strategic planning and understanding how AI aligns with business goals, aligning with 'Business Understanding'.

job_tasks.phrase: Align AI systems with data privacy regulations and implement standard methodologies for responsible AI development.
job_tasks.justification: This involves ensuring software systems adhere to regulations and responsible development practices, fitting under 'Software Development' with an ethical dimension.

job_tasks.phrase: Present complex AI concepts and project progress to a wide range of collaborators through presentations and reports.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, software engineers, and subject matter experts
Stay abreast of the latest advancements in AI/ML, particularly in areas such as natural language processing and large language models.
Align AI systems with data privacy regulations and implement standard methodologies for responsible AI development.
Present complex AI concepts and project progress to a wide range of collaborators through presentations and reports.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes designing, developing, and fine-tuning generative AI models, including specific techniques like RAG, PEFT (LoRA, QLoRA), and working with LLMs and transformer architectures. It also highlights building user-facing AI solutions and integrating them into products, which aligns perfectly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
